sentences.english: Objectire To summarize and evaluate the effect of surgical treatment on humeral intercondylar fracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结评估手术治疗肱骨髁间骨折的疗效。

sentences.english: This paper is concerned with strain measurement in central cross-section of cavia porcellus humerus in vivo.
sentences.chinese: 对豚鼠左前肢肱骨中央截面进行在体应交测量。

sentences.english: ObjectivesTo review the evidence supporting the various interventions for treating proximal humeral fractures.
sentences.chinese: 目标对于肱骨近端骨折的各种治疗进行回顾和评价。

sentences.english: Limb salvage following resection of a tumor in the proximal part of the humerus poses many challenges.
sentences.chinese: 肱骨近端肿瘤切除后保肢目前仍然存在很多挑战。

sentences.english: To observe the effect of the nonunion of humeral shaft fracture treated by bidentate intramedullary locking nails.
sentences.chinese: 探讨分叉交锁髓内钉治疗肱骨干骨折不愈合的疗效。

sentences.english: The results of removal alone were dependent on the size of the defect in the capitellum .
sentences.chinese: 而骨片切除的效果取决于肱骨小头缺损的大小。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the proper internal fixation methods in the treatment of humeral diaphyseal fractures.
sentences.chinese: 目的正确选择肱骨干骨折手术内固定。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical results of Supracondylar fracture of humerus in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨儿童肱骨髁上骨折的治疗效果。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, cubitus varus is the most common complication of the supracondylar fracture of humerus.
sentences.chinese: 肘内翻畸形是小儿肱骨髁上骨折常见的并发症。

sentences.english: Conclusion Intramedullary interlocking nail was suitable for the treatment of humerus shaft fracture.
sentences.chinese: 结论肱骨交锁髓内钉适用于肱骨干骨折的治疗。

sentences.english: Conclusion Intramedullary interlocking nail was suitable for the treatment of humerus shaft fracture.
sentences.chinese: 结论肱骨交锁髓内钉适用于肱骨干骨折的治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To provide the exact dimensions of the intertubercular sulcus of the humerus.
sentences.chinese: 目的提供详尽的肱骨结节间沟形态资料。

sentences.english: Objective To study the relationship between innervation of lateral epicondylar humeri and cervical root nerve.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解肱骨外上髁的神经支配与颈神经根的关系。

sentences.english: The concomitant contusion of greater tuberosity was found in all 12 partial rotator-cuff tears.
sentences.chinese: 所有12例部分撕裂患者均见伴存的肱骨大结节挫伤。

sentences.english: Objective To discussion the reason of adult humerus fracture fixation Failure.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨肱骨中下段骨折内固定失效原因。

sentences.english: The posterior approach to the arm is suitable for operative treatment for the fracture of the middle inferior part of the humerus.
sentences.chinese: 臂后侧手术入路适合于肱骨中下段骨折等手术处理。

definition: ilium (the large flat bone of the pelvic girdle)
semitendinosus, one of the hamstring muscles in the thigh
